message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. After considering your interest, I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a competitive price, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $870000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $920000. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $880000, which is the highest I can go. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand your constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $900000. This is the best I can do, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $890000, which is the absolute maximum I can afford. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're at your maximum budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $895000. This is the best I can do, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.
